definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: And before that, he was a Deputy WHCS.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，他是白宫办公厅副主任。

sentences.english: He is the highest ranking White House official convicted of felony in years.
sentences.chinese: 他是现白宫高级官员这些年被判重刑最严重的人员。

sentences.english: It also delves into her roles in the presidential campaign and in the White House.
sentences.chinese: 文章还分析了米歇尔在总统竞选和白宫中扮演的角色。

sentences.english: A cloud of suspicion still hung over the White House.
sentences.chinese: 白宫上空仍笼罩着一团疑云。

sentences.english: Years before, Van Buren had done much himself to elect Jackson to the White House.
sentences.chinese: 几年前，范布伦为杰克逊入主白宫立下了汗马功劳。

sentences.english: That night, the White House was open to the public.
sentences.chinese: 此言正确，白宫之门向公众敞开。

sentences.english: The west wing was almost completely gutted.
sentences.chinese: 白宫西翼几乎被完全摧毁了。

sentences.english: He was such a fan of chewing tobacco that brass spittoons were installed in the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他嗜烟如命，以至于把黄铜质的痰盂都放在白宫。

sentences.english: But today, it's sad to say that probably the White House is the only piece which is not dysfunctio nal.
sentences.chinese: 不过现在，遗憾地说，白宫可能一整块都不正常。

sentences.english: In the White House, there's the desk that he sits at.
sentences.chinese: 在白宫里，有一个他坐在那儿办公的桌子。

sentences.english: Besides, we had to have some money to modernize the White House.
sentences.chinese: 另外，我们必须留一些钱来使白宫现代化。

sentences.english: That is the most direct and reliable way to establish its factualness.
sentences.chinese: 这是确证白宫真实性的最直接和最可靠的方法。

sentences.english: The Roosevelt family poses for the camera two years after moving into the White House.
sentences.chinese: 这是罗斯福佳通入住白宫两年以后的照的相片。

sentences.english: But then the White House staff is several steps removed from a negotiating process.
sentences.chinese: 但白宫官员随后却在谈判过程中感到了一些束手无策。

sentences.english: He and his wife, Michelle, arrived at the White House 14 minutes early.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的妻子米歇尔提前了14分钟到达了白宫。

sentences.english: He held a presidential review of the troops from a flag-draped grandstand built in front of the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他在白宫前面的看台上检阅了部队。

definition: Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-

pinyin: tuo3 yuan2 xing2 ban4 gong1 shi4

definition: Mike Pence (1959-), US Republican politician, US vice president from 2017
Sichuanese pidgin (the mix of Standard Mandarin and Sichuanese dialect)/(Tw) surname Trump
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Nancy Pelosi (1940-), US Democrat politician from California, speaker of US House of Representatives from 2007
